COM.MC.summary: Catenon, S.A., a technology-based company, provides recruitment services in Europe, Asia, the United States, Oceania, and Africa. Its platform engages in searching, attracting, assessing, and introducing candidates to the clients, as well as presents the candidates to clients over the web through tools, such as the technical filmed interview. The company also provides real-time information services. Catenon, S.A. was founded in 2000 and is based in Madrid, Spain.
